resources.string: This app is designed for the purpose of alerting the user of the rising hot temperatures insided their car. So that actions can be taken by the user if they have forgotten/left their child or pet in the car. The app is only responsible for sending alerts to the user about the hot temeratur inside their vehicles. It is the sole responsibility of the user to take heed of the warning given by the app, and act quickly to save their child or pet from the heat. The reason our team decided to create this app is because the number of children and pets who have lost their lives in vehicular heatstroke deaths has been increasing every year according to https://www.carprousa.com/Reminder-Kids--Pets-Left-In-Hot-Cars-Are-Deadly/a/144. We hope that this app can save the lives of many childrens and pets as well as make a difference in the lives of parents/pet owners by saving them from making a mistake they might regret for the rest of their lives.

Some of the questions users may have:
Having this app make it safe to leave child/pets inside car? -No, you should Never leave a child or pet in an unattended car even with the windows down or part way down source: https://www.carprousa.com/Reminder-Kids--Pets-Left-In-Hot-Cars-Are-Deadly/a/144
Having any difficulties connecting the sensor with this app? -Try restarting the app or try to reboot the sensor.
At what temperature does it become dangerous for children? - When the temperature reaches 40 Degree Celcius it leads tp heatstrokes
How quickly does the temperature rises inside car with regards to time? -10 minutes = 19 degree increase 20 minutes = 29 degree increase 30 minutes = 34 degree increase 1 hour = 43 degree increase over 1 hour= 45 to 55 degree increase source: https://www.carprousa.com/Reminder-Kids--Pets-Left-In-Hot-Cars-Are-Deadly/a/144
If you have any questions regarding this app feel free contact our team at n01334306@humbermail.ca
